Reviews.Title: “Great value for busy and expensive Venice.”
Reviews.Author: Autumn L
Reviews.Content: wasnt ritz wasnt paying nor expect tourist friendly weekend paid 226 nights town thats bad remote tv didnt nice bathroom clean bed minibar balcony view wasnt spectacular proximity vaparetto neighborhood lively lots shops safe walking late evenings breakfast typically european wonderful smell pasteries wafted hall mornings included price traveling budget reasonable expectations recommend hotel
